message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is there any flexibility on your end to meet me in the middle?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob.  While $18,000 represents a fair price for its value, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. This offer reflects my bottom line.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $15,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,500? I think that's a fair price for the product, and I'm really interested in making a deal.
